SEARCH
Package net.chaossquad.mclib.combattracking

Klasse PlayerFight

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.combattracking.PlayerFight
public class PlayerFight extends Object
Represents a fight against one player. You can use
ungültiges @link 
{@link this#getStats()
} to get the damaged caused by all players against the player that was damaged. You can use
ungültiges @link 
{@link this#getKiller(PlayerFight)
} to get the player with the most damage, and
ungültiges @link 
{@link this#getAssistants(PlayerFight, UUID)
} to get all players that dealt damage and are not the killer.
